sub_title: Global Head of Brand PR at Just Eat Takeaway.com
summary:
•	15+ years of experience and a proven track record of designing and implementing successful Communications / Brand PR campaigns on a global, regional and local level for biggest consumer brands 
•	360 Communications expertise with focus on digital marketing, e-commerce, social media, Public Relations, external partnerships, and stakeholder management, and crisis management 
•	Passion for and business savviness in Influencer Marketing and new social media platforms 
•	Coach and capability builder for regional and local offices  
•	Global scope and experience with focus on Europe
•	Communications Strategy and Planning (Global, Regional and Local level) 
•	Influencer Marketing and Social Media strategy  
•	Market & Consumer Research
•	Competitive Analysis 
•	Stakeholder mapping 
•	Narrative and Content Creation 
•	Media Relations 
•	3rd Party Strategic Networking and Relationships 
•	PR and Social Media Measurement and Reporting 
•	Risk Assessment and Scenario Planning 
•	Crisis and Issues Management 	
•	PR agency network management 
•	Team leadership 
•	Coaching

profile_positions.description:
Created the discipline of Brand (Consumer) PR at joint Just Eat Takeaway.com
Recruited the team and chosen best in class agencies, right for the business 
Key contact point for internal and external stakeholders
profile_positions.title: Global Head of Brand PR

profile_positions.description: Leading award winning Brand PR campaigns for Pampers, Always and Tampax
profile_positions.title: Senior Regional Communications Manager, Baby & Feminine Care

profile_positions.description:
JOB SCOPE: 
•	Develop global strategy and design of Influencer Marketing plans for the biggest brand in Procter & Gamble (Pampers, >10BN annual revenue)
•	Create and oversee implementation of PR, social media and digital engagement strategy for Pampers 
•	Design and oversee activation of Pampers new product launches globally 
•	Coach and support regional and local PR teams 
•	Special focus on key regions / markets: Greater China (China), NA (USA), UK, Russia

KEY RESULTS / ACHIEVEMENTS:
•	Developed and deployed influencer marketing strategy for Pampers, based on insights and innovative data-driven influencer identification, measurement and boost in the marketing mix to reach millennial audiences in a relevant way
•	To overturn Word of Mouth decline globally, step-changed global Pampers social media strategy, incl. creative idea, authentic tone of voice, visual ID, influencer network and measurements
•	Converted successful PR campaign from previous assignment into global strategy (Preemie diaper launch), which generated over 4 billion impressions and awards in over 7 countries
•	     Led development of 2 product launch toolkits for global reapplication (Influencer and endorsement strategy, risk assessment, key messages, digital assets, partnership guidance) 
•	     Coached Pampers global PR teams and agency network to develop and implement communications plans 
•	     Promoted to Senior Communications Leader on the job
profile_positions.title: Global Baby Care Senior Communications Manager, Pampers Head Quarters

profile_positions.description:
JOB SCOPE: 
•	Led development, implementation, measurement and reporting of 10 + regional PR campaigns worth £5+ million
•	Develop 3rd party partnerships with healthcare organisations, government agendas, celebrities and NGOs 
•	Prevent and manage crisis to protect brand reputation   
•	Consolidate regional PR agency network into one global team  
•	Markets: UK, Ireland, Sweden, Finland, Norway and Denmark 

KEY RESULTS / ACHIEVEMENTS 
•	Designed and executed Pampers Preemie campaign that turned around Pampers UK equity decline. Generated 1 billion PR impressions (170 media stories), 1MM organic reach and engagement rate (34%), (5x higher than Pampers average) and 90% positive engagement. Delivered Pampers online Share of Voice in the UK >70%. 
•	Directed Always #LikeAGirl regional implementation which resulted in 700 million PR impressions and 250 pieces of coverage in the UK & Ireland alone. Activated 40+ Online Influencers. In partnership with UN Women and Olympic Athlete ambassadors. 
•	Led regional Pampers UNICEF campaign “1 pack = 1 vaccine” campaign. In partnership with celebrities (Emma Bunton, Kimberley Walsh, Pernilla Walghren) generated over 800 million PR impressions across Northern Europe.
profile_positions.title: Regional Communications Manager, Baby & Feminine Care Northern Europe

profile_positions.description:
JOB SCOPE: 
•	Lead the merger of Northern Europe markets, establishing scale and knowledge sharing between internal PR teams and agencies across the UK and Nordic markets 
•	Oversee creative development and execution of PR campaigns 3 categories 
•	Nurture external relationships with critical endorsers and media for mutual benefit 
•	Run PR agency teams across 6 markets

KEY RESULTS / ACHIEVEMENTS:
•	Designed innovative campaign leveraging Swedish Henrik Lundqvist for head & shoulders to create media interest for relatively low interest product. The campaign exceeded its targets with PR reach over 23 million, and over 620 PR clippings. Examples of best coverage: top national daily Expressen, top lifestyle glossy for men King Magazine. 
•	Turned around major media and stakeholder crisis for Always brand (government ingredient inquiry, 80% negative consumer and media sentiment) into a success by leveraging local Influencers behind equity #LikeaGirl campaign.
•	Created “One Team” agency network set up in the region, with unified planning, reporting and robust system of knowledge sharing 
•	Successfully managed relationship with Nordic’s key safety endorser Asthma and Allergy Association
profile_positions.title: Regional Communications Manager, Baby and Feminine Care Northern Europe

profile_positions.description:
JOB SCOPE: 
•	Activation of PR and social media campaigns for 5 brands 
•	Crisis support 
•	UK + Ireland Agency management 

KEY RESULTS / ACHIEVEMENTS 
•	Developed and activated P&G Capital Clean Up, in partnership with the Mayor of London: Led the ideation of this multi-brand London 2012 Olympics campaign. The campaign received widespread acclaim both internally & externally, resulting in 352 million PR impressions and phenomenal feedback from the Mayor of London’s office: “We have created an outstanding case study of a public-private sector partnership. This has been a brilliant partnership, not only based on the achievements, but also the process. We really wish there were more clients with your approach.”
profile_positions.title: Country Communications Manager, Fabric and Home Care, Hair & Skin Care, United Kingdom and Ireland

profile_positions.description:
JOB SCOPE: 
•	Design and execute internal communication
•	Build P&G Corporate reputation externally with investors, local authorities and prospective recruits 

KEY RESULTS / ACHIEVEMENTS 
•	Managed the corporate PR event of opening new Skin Care plant in Poland to government and business media audiences. 
•	Involved in setting strategy for employee communication in Warsaw office.
profile_positions.title: Country Communication Manager, Corporate Communications
